activities: This policy defines the procedures necessary to protect the privacy of our employee information with respect to personal data transferred from the European Union (EU) and the United States (US).  This policy applies to all personal information received in the US from the EU.  Personal information is defined as any information which identifies current or former employees for job related purposes only relating to your employment, job responsibilities or to make services and benefits available, including sensitive information relating to health, race or ethnic origin (Personal Information).
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
